name: SurveyMonkey Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Survey Monkey events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 SurveyMonkey Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Survey Monkey events occur

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

event.name: event
available_options: Collector Deleted (值: collector_deleted) - A collector is deleted
Collector Updated (值: collector_updated) - A collector is updated
Response Completed (值: response_completed) - A survey response is completed
Response Created (值: response_created) - A respondent begins a survey
Response Deleted (值: response_deleted) - A response is deleted
Response Disqualified (值: response_disqualified) - A survey response is disqualified
Response Overquota (值: response_overquota) - A response is over a survey’s quota
Response Updated (值: response_updated) - A survey response is updated

surveyIds.name: surveyIds
surveyIds.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
surveyIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Survey Names or IDs | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

surveyId.name: surveyId
surveyId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
surveyId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Survey Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

collectorIds.name: collectorIds
collectorIds.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
collectorIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Collector Names or IDs | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default the webhook-data only contain the IDs. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: By default the webhook-data only contain the IDs. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically. | 默认值: True

onlyAnswers.name: onlyAnswers
onlyAnswers.description: Whether to return only the answers of the form and not any of the other data
onlyAnswers.natural_language_description: 参数名: Only Answers | 作用: Whether to return only the answers of the form and not any of the other data | 默认值: True
